text: The 1975–76 Algerian Championnat National was the 14th season of the Algerian Championnat National since its establishment in 1962. A total of 16 teams contested the league, with MC Alger as the defending champions. ==Team summaries== === Promotion and relegation === Teams promoted from Algerian Division 2 1975-1976 * RCG Oran * ES Guelma * ASO Chlef Teams relegated to Algerian Division 2 1976-1977 * WA Boufarik * Hamra Annaba * USM Khenchela * USM Bel-Abbès * ASM Oran ==League table== ==References== ==External links== *1975–76 Algerian Championnat National Category:Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1 seasons Category:1975–76 in Algerian football Algeria
title: 1975–76 Algerian Championnat National
